name: FILLMEM
description: This is a TAS Professional 3.0 command here for compatibility. There is no preferred TAS Professional 5.1 command/function.
syntax: FILLMEM mem_area# START start_val NCHR num_chrs CHR chr_to_use

parameters.name: mem_area#
parameters.description: This is the memory area to fill. This must resolve to a value of 1 through 4.

parameters.name: start_val
parameters.description: The starting character in the memory area. The first character is at position 1.

parameters.name: num_chrs
parameters.description: The number of characters to fill.

parameters.name: chr_to_use
parameters.description: What to use as a fill character.

comments: This is the equivalent of the TAS Professional 3.0 command Fill Memory.
